title: Fix user list to display all 7 users instead of only 2

requirements.text: Fix the users list page to display all 7 added users instead of only showing 2 users

quotes: i adding 7 users but users list inside show only 2 users list. i required show all users details

acceptanceCriteria: Users page displays all 7 users that were added to the system
No pagination or limit issues preventing full user list from being displayed
All user details (PayGo ID, Name, Email, Mobile, Role, Status) are visible for each user

constraints: Preserve the existing user table layout and design
Maintain role-based access control for the users page
